imdb.title: Spiritpact
imdb.plot: You Keika is heir of Exorcists, stricken with poverty and computer tech, until one night he gets hit by car and become a ghost. Tanmoku Ki appears and asks him to make a pact to fight Evil Spirits. Here starts the friendship of ou...

episodes.title: Episode #2.2
episodes.plot: One day, while attending school with Ki, Keika encounters a young woman at the university who is able to see him and seems interested in being his friend.

episodes.title: Episode #2.5
episodes.plot: Rocked by the truth of his dearest friend's fate, Ki is overcome by nightmares that leave him unconscious and could prevent him from ever awakening again.

episodes.title: Episode #2.9
episodes.plot: Using the power of the mirror of the netherworld, Ki and Keika succeed in seeing Shouken's memories.

episodes.title: Episode #2.11
episodes.plot: Sekijin and his underlings locate where Shouken has been kept hidden and steal away his body, trying to get it back to the Shouken family residence before his soul scatters.

episodes.title: Episode #1.3
episodes.plot: Tanmoku Ki returns to his family home for the first time since making a pact with his new spirit shadow.

episodes.title: Episode #1.9
episodes.plot: You Keika and Tanmoku Ki are desperately trying to escape from Shito Ritsu's intense attacks. Having lost his spiritual powers Ki is incredibly weak.
